nodes.text: Juri juice was an inebriating and addictive drink favored by Kabe at the Mos Eisley Cantina. It was sold in variously-sized and -colored collectible jars.
Many different flavors for juri juice existed, the most notable of which was made from a Rodian's blood.

In the Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace video game, Qui-Gon Jinn has to offer some juri juice to one of Watto's workers, in order to convince him to lead him to Watto, so he could negotiate about setting Anakin Skywalker free. The item description describes it as a type of ale originating on Corellia.
